Package com.intellij.xdebugger.breakpoints

Class XBreakpointType<B extends XBreakpoint<P>,P extends XBreakpointProperties>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.xdebugger.breakpoints.XBreakpointType<B,P>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaBreakpointTypeBase, PyExceptionBreakpointType, XLineBreakpointType

    public abstract class XBreakpointType<B extends XBreakpoint<P>,P extends XBreakpointProperties>
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement this class to support new type of breakpoints. An implementation should be registered in a plugin.xml:

    <extensions defaultExtensionNs="com.intellij">
      <xdebugger.breakpointType implementation="qualified-class-name"/>
    </extensions>

    Use this class only for breakpoints like exception breakpoints in Java. If a breakpoint will be put on some line in a file use XLineBreakpointType instead

        id - an unique id of breakpoint type
        title - title of tab in the breakpoints dialog
        suspendThreadSupported - true if suspending only one thread is supported for this type of breakpoints

        public boolean isAddBreakpointButtonVisible()

        Returns:
        true if "Add" button should be visible in "Breakpoints" dialog

      • addBreakpoint

        public B addBreakpoint(Project project,
                       javax.swing.JComponent parentComponent)
        This method is called then "Add" button is pressed in the "Breakpoints" dialog
        Parameters:
        project -
        parentComponent -
        Returns:
        the created breakpoint or null if breakpoint wasn't created

      • createDefaultBreakpoint

        public XBreakpoint<P> createDefaultBreakpoint(XBreakpointType.XBreakpointCreator<P> creator)
        Returns properties of the default breakpoint. The default breakpoints cannot be deleted and is always shown on top of the breakpoints list in the dialog.
        Returns:
        a default breakpoint or null if default breakpoint isn't supported
